WorkItem.ClosedComment: Closing this issue, continue posts on the other thread
WorkItem.Description: Have 2.3.10.  When I am trying to load character from armory RAWR just hangs at "Get character from armory" step beginning.  "Cancell All" button doesn't work.   I can see from that some bytes are transferred, but nothing happens. As I can see this is not common problem, so please advice why this can happen.  I have 32 bit Vista Ultimate.

Comments.Message:
I've experienced same problem just today. so its not just you.

And same goes for websites that use armory importing like www.gearscore.info or www.wtfismygearscore.com. Could be something to do if blizz changed some code on their websites ?
We need more information. Please refer to http://rawr.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=Troubleshooting and post error report from step 8 in armory import section.

I have the same problem. I did the update to 10 today and now i cant get the caracter from armory. 9 used to work yesterday but now today it doesnt work aswell. This is my error message:

Step Name: Get Character
Description: No character returned from the Armory. Is the Armory down?

I'm using firefox for the webclient
Is the Exception and Web Client Exception entry empty in the error report?

Step Name: Get Character
Description: No character returned from the Armory. Is the Armory down?

This is the error report I got, and no the armory isn't down I just checked.
Have you double clicked on the description and get the error report with copy to clipboard button? If so can you tell me what is in the exception entries?

Step Name: Get Character
Description: No character returned from the Armory. Is the Armory down?
Exception: No Exception

Web Client
Exception: Too many automatic redirections were attempted
If everyone else has the same error then this is a duplicate of http://rawr.codeplex.com/WorkItem/View.aspx?WorkItemId=16520

I read the troubleshooting section. Unfortunately, there's no error message to copy-paste - it's just hangs  on the "Downloading Character Definition" with no error returned.  Checked it with older version - same problem.  US armory and EU (one I use) armory are both up and running.  Is there way to start it in some kind of diagnostic mode for more info?
Ahh, and it used to work before, I haven't installed any new antiviruses or anything, my existing antivirus is up and running and don't detect any bad software, neither does Spybot Search&Destroy.

Wait for quite long time and managed to get to the "Description: No character returned from the Armory. Is the Armory down?" message.  So, that really seem to be duplicate of one you mentioned, but than - what to do to fix it?
